title: How to write a NOC letter to join the NCC - Quora

response.answer_text: You can not write a NOC for yourself no matter for what purpose it is required. NOC is issued by your employer/institution/parents/guardian stating that they have no objection for you doing a particular activity/assignment/course……….. that you want to join in. So, going by your question, you can not write a NOC letter to join the NCC.

You don't need to write a letter yourself. Collect the NOC form from the ANO of your institution and get it attested with a doctor. Preferably a government doctor. The Process might be different for various directorate. But first you need to enquire with you institution and not on quora.
